message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $875000. What do you think?
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on that, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to reduce the price further to $870000. What do you think?
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $865000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to reduce the price further to $870000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $867500.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm offering the product to you for $868000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $867000.
